dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT j.attribute5 bill_lading, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.number_with_japan_tsc(cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT') || j.job_xid house_bill_lading, j.attribute3 ref_num, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YY / HH:MIPM') system_date, sref1.shipment_refnum_value itn, (SELECT TO_CHAR(gtd.transaction_date,'fmMM/DD/YYYY') FROM gtm_transaction_date gtd WHERE gtd.date_qualifier_gid = 'EXPORT DATE' AND gtd.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) departure_date, (SELECT loc1.province_code FROM job_order_release_join jorj1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul1 ON jorj1.order_release_gid = ssul1.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj1 ON sessuj1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej1 ON sessuj1.s_equipment_gid = ssej1.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship1 ON ssej1.shipment_gid = ship1.shipment_gid AND ship1.perspective = 'S' AND ship1.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship1.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship1.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN location loc1 ON ship1.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid WHERE jorj1.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) origin_location, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'XXX',s.dest_location_gid,'COUNTRY') dest_location, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_loc(s.shipment_gid, cv.charter_voyage_gid,'CHARTER_VOYAGE','SCOULAR.VIA_LOCATION_ID', (SELECT DISTINCT gtp.location_gid FROM gtm_transaction_port gtp WHERE gtp.gtm_port_qualifier_gid = 'PORT OF EXPORT' AND gtp.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)))) export_port, (SELECT tm.transport_mode_name FROM transport_mode tm WHERE tm.transport_mode_gid IN ( SELECT gtrans1.transport_mode_gid FROM gtm_transaction gtrans1 WHERE gtrans1.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)))) transport_mode_gid, (SELECT LISTAGG(sa.alias,', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY sa.alias) FROM servprov_alias sa WHERE sa.servprov_alias_qual_gid = 'SC' AND sa.servprov_gid IN (SELECT gtip.involved_party_contact_gid FROM gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip WHERE gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CARRIER' AND gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)))) sp_alias, (SELECT gtrans2.conveyance_name FROM gtm_transaction gtrans2 WHERE gtrans2.gtm_transaction_type = 'SHIPMENT' AND gtrans2.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) conveyance_name, (CASE WHEN (SELECT gtr.remark_text FROM gtm_transaction_remark gtr WHERE gtr.remark_qual_gid = 'ROUTED EXPORT TRANSACTION' AND gtr.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) = 'YES' THEN 'X' ELSE '' END) is_routed_yes, (CASE WHEN (SELECT gtr.remark_text FROM gtm_transaction_remark gtr WHERE gtr.remark_qual_gid = 'ROUTED EXPORT TRANSACTION' AND gtr.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) = 'YES' THEN '' ELSE 'X' END) is_routed_no, (SELECT gtr.remark_text FROM gtm_transaction_remark gtr WHERE gtr.remark_qual_gid = 'RELATED COMPANY' AND gtr.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) related_companies, (CASE WHEN (SELECT gtrans3.is_hazardous_cargo FROM gtm_transaction gtrans3 WHERE gtrans3.gtm_transaction_type = 'SHIPMENT' AND gtrans3.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) = 'Y' THEN 'X' ELSE '' END) is_hazardous_yes, (CASE WHEN (SELECT gtrans4.is_hazardous_cargo FROM gtm_transaction gtrans4 WHERE gtrans4.gtm_transaction_type = 'SHIPMENT' AND gtrans4.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) = 'N' THEN 'X' ELSE '' END) is_hazardous_no, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place(s.shipment_gid,'XXX',cv.dest_location_gid) destination_location, (SELECT DISTINCT gpr.refnum_value FROM gtm_party_refnum gpr INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON gpr.contact_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'USPPI' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid)) AND gpr.gtm_party_refnum_qual_gid = 'EIN' AND ROWNUM = 1) gtm_refnum, (SELECT loc2.province_code FROM job_order_release_join jorj2 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul2 ON jorj2.order_release_gid = ssul2.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj2 ON sessuj2.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul2.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej2 ON sessuj2.s_equipment_gid = ssej2.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship2 ON ssej2.shipment_gid = ship2.shipment_gid AND ship2.perspective = 'S' AND ship2.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship2.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship2.is_primary = 'Y' INNER JOIN location loc2 ON ship2.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE jorj2.job_gid = j.job_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) point_origin, sref1.shipment_refnum_value itn_number FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'ITN' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON ssul.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN job j ON jorj.job_gid = j.job_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT (SELECT DISTINCT con.company_name FROM contact con INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON con.contact_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'USPPI' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) usppi_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'USPPI' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) usppi_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'USPPI' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) usppi_city_state_zip, (SELECT DISTINCT con.company_name FROM contact con INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON con.contact_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) consignee_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) consignee_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) consignee_city_state_zip, (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_name FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'FORWARDING AGENT' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) agent_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'FORWARDING AGENT' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) agent_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'FORWARDING AGENT' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) agent_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label( (SELECT DISTINCT con.contact_gid FROM contact con INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON con.contact_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'FORWARDING AGENT' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))),'TEL:') agent_phone, (SELECT DISTINCT con.company_name FROM contact con INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON con.contact_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ALSO_NOTIFY_PARTY' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))) intermed_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ALSO_NOTIFY_PARTY' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) intermed_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip( (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid FROM location loc INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON loc.location_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ALSO_NOTIFY_PARTY' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))))) intermed_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_fullname_with_label( (SELECT DISTINCT con.contact_gid FROM contact con INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON con.contact_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ALSO_NOTIFY_PARTY' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))),'ATTN:') intermed_contact, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label( (SELECT DISTINCT con.contact_gid FROM contact con INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_involved_party gtip ON con.contact_gid = gtip.involved_party_contact_gid AND gtip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.ALSO_NOTIFY_PARTY' WHERE gtip.gtm_transaction_gid IN ( SELECT gtref.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtref WHERE gtref.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid='SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtref.refnum_value = (SELECT s1.shipment_xid FROM shipment s1 WHERE shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid))),'TEL:') intermed_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') ops_manager_name FROM shipment s WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT a.classification_code classification_code, a.description, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.total_gross_weight),'999,999,990.000')) || ' ' || a.gross_weight_uom_code total_gross_weight, TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.total_net_weight),'999,999,990.000')) || ' ' || a.net_weight_uom_code total_net_weight, '$' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.total_value),'999,999,990.00')) total_amount FROM (SELECT gpcc.classification_code, (SELECT description FROM gtm_prod_class_code_desc WHERE gtm_prod_class_code_gid = gpcc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid) description, (SELECT (CASE WHEN gtlq.uom_code = 'KG' THEN gtlq.quantity_value WHEN gtlq.uom_code = 'G' THEN gtlq.quantity_value * .001 WHEN gtlq.uom_code = 'LB' THEN gtlq.quantity_value * 0.45359237 WHEN gtlq.uom_code = 'TON' THEN (gtlq.quantity_value * 2000) * 0.45359237 WHEN gtlq.uom_code = 'MTON' OR gtlq.uom_code = 'MT' OR gtlq.uom_code = 'T' THEN gtlq.quantity_value * 1000 END) FROM gtm_trans_line_quantity gtlq WHERE gtlq.gtm_quantity_type_gid = 'TOTAL GROSS WEIGHT' AND gtlq.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid) total_gross_weight, 'KG' gross_weight_uom_code, (SELECT gtlrq.quantity_value FROM gtm_trans_line_report_quantity gtlrq WHERE gtlrq.gtm_quantity_type_gid = 'NET_WEIGHT' AND gtlrq.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) total_net_weight, (SELECT gtlrq.uom_code FROM gtm_trans_line_report_quantity gtlrq WHERE gtlrq.gtm_quantity_type_gid = 'NET_WEIGHT' AND gtlrq.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) net_weight_uom_code, (SELECT SUM(gtlc.currency_value) FROM gtm_trans_line_currency gtlc WHERE gtlc.gtm_value_qualifier_gid = 'TOTAL VALUE' AND gtlc.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid) total_value FROM gtm_prod_class_code gpcc INNER JOIN gtm_tr_prod_classification gtpc ON gpcc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid = gtpc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid INNER JOIN gtm_transaction_line gtl ON gtpc.gtm_transaction_line_gid = gtl.gtm_transaction_line_gid WHERE gtl.gtm_transaction_gid = (SELECT gtr.gtm_transaction_gid FROM gtm_trans_refnum gtr WHERE gtr.gtm_trans_refnum_qual_gid = 'SHIPMENT REFERENCE NUMBER' AND gtr.refnum_value = (SELECT sh.shipment_xid FROM shipment sh WHERE sh.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID))) a GROUP BY a.classification_code, a.description, a.gross_weight_uom_code, a.net_weight_uom_code ORDER BY a.classification_code
